Xyloth√®que

Blessings

In the TST Project, we define blessings as short prose, regularly formulaic phrases, often written in the margins, which are meant to attract auspiciousness, but can also express a credo or reverence to a god or a spiritual master.

BlessingShelfmarkRepositoryTitleUnitPage/folioPlacement
